roadmap.heading: My Journey
roadmap.subtitle: A roadmap of growth and innovation

job1.title: Agentic Developer Intern
job1.description: Collaborating with AI agents in coding, testing, and deploying platform features for the Swedish Startup Nation Data Platform.

job2.title: Full-Stack Developer & Systems Analyst
job2.description: Led migration from 2008 legacy system to modern React platform. Built REST APIs, optimized Oracle DB queries (60% faster), and created AI chatbot.

job3.title: Front-End Development Intern
job3.description: Developed responsive websites using HTML, CSS, WordPress, and JavaScript. Customized themes and implemented UI/UX best practices.

job4.title: Software Engineer & Creative Designer
job4.description: Co-developed internal social platforms, designed multi-channel catalogs, and created culturally localized content that boosted engagement.

job5.title: B.A. Fine Arts (GPA 4.0) & B.Sc. Computer Science
job5.company: Fine Arts Academy of Rome & Abrar University of Tehran
job5.description: Unique combination of artistic creativity and technical expertise in computer science.

skills.heading: Skills & Expertise
skills.subtitle: Where creativity meets technology
skills.aiDesc: Building intelligent applications with OpenAI APIs
skills.perfDesc: Optimized queries 60% faster, reduced load time 40%

artProjects.heading: Artistic Projects
artProjects.subtitle: Where art meets activism and social impact

plasticBlue.title: Plastic Blue
plasticBlue.description: Painting series and artistic studies exploring the impact of plastic pollution on nature and human life.

womenLifeFreedom.title: Women Life Freedom
womenLifeFreedom.description: Led workshops and educational activities across multiple schools, engaging students in discussions on women's rights and freedom.

illustrationWorkshops.title: Illustration Workshops
illustrationWorkshops.description: Led visual identity, promotional assets and on-site facilitation for Liberi di Crescere Association children's-rights non-profit event.

footer.artCtaDescription: Beyond code and pixels, I create art. Fine Arts Academy graduate exploring plastic pollution (Plastic Blue series), leading children's rights workshops (Women Life Freedom), and illustration for social causes.
